players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Alice's death is tragic. As the only kill, it suggests a single mafioso. We must analyze everyone's behavior carefully."
Diana: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We should vote him out immediately."
Charlie: "Diana, that's a very bold claim to make so early. Can you explain how you know Bob is the mafioso? What makes you so certain?"
Diana: "I am the detective. I investigated Bob and he is mafioso. We must vote him out now."
You: "Diana, if you're the real detective, why did you wait until after Charlie questioned you to claim it? That seems staged. I think you're mafia trying to frame me."
Charlie: "Bob raises a good point about the timing. Diana, if you're really the detective, why didn't you lead with that information instead of waiting for me to question you?"

Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

players.name: Diana
